desc: Frankly Fashions sells boutique quality yet completely affordable Children’s clothing and accessories. Although known for their handmade bows, clothing, and scrunchies, Frankly Fashions has a wide variety of products to offer.

layout.text:
Thank you for shopping small and supporting this mama owned shop. Here you will find different beautiful boutique clothing, handmade items and accessories. If there is something you’re interested in that you do not see on the page please contact me for a custom order.
RTS items ship within 1-5 days. Made to order items ship within 1-3 weeks depending on fabric availability and order volume.
If you purchase RTS and made to order items at the same time, they will all ship together.
I sincerely appreciate all of you amazing people!
